actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lawrence R. Machado.

summary.text: Deems the rheumatoid arthritis of a named individual, for purposes of eligibility for veterans' disability compensation, to be a service-connected disability resulting from active service in the U.S. Army during a specified period. Declares any amounts payable as such compensation to be in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States such individual may have relating to such disability.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lawrence R. Machado.
